short_summary: Pefferlaw Shoreline Rehabilitation, ON, for approximately $100m of shoreline restoration including excavation and removal of existing small to medium sized stones and soil, and supply and installation of new rip rap.
description: Shoreline rehabilitation project on the south end of Lake Simcoe, approximately 100 km northeast of Toronto. Contractor to remove existing small to medium sized stones and soil, and install new rip rap. Duration approximately 2 to 3 weeks.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Pefferlaw Shoreline Rehabilitation, ON**

**Reference Number:** cb-253-34365165

The Government of Canada, represented by Fisheries and Oceans Canada, invites vendors to participate in a procurement process for the Pefferlaw Shoreline Rehabilitation project in Ontario. The project aims to restore approximately 100 meters of shoreline at the south end of Lake Simcoe, located northeast of Toronto.

**Project Details:**

* Work includes excavation and removal of existing stones and soil, as well as the supply and installation of new rip rap.
* The project site is located at the end of Holmes Point Road, with site coordinates: 44°20'25.9"N 79°13'06.3"W.
* Estimated project duration: 2 to 3 weeks.

**Procurement Information:**

* **Invitation to Qualify (ITQ):** The procurement process is a Competitive - Open bidding process.
* **Technical Evaluation Criteria:** The lowest price shall prevail.
* **Trade Agreement:** The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.
* **Regions:** The project is restricted to Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Solicitation Details:**

* Tender Closing Date: December 02, 2024, at 14:00 ET.
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 13, 2025.
* Expected Contract End Date: March 15, 2025.

**Procurement Contact Information:**

* Gloria Tsaka Kipuni
* Email: [Gloria.TsakaKipuni@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Gloria.TsakaKipuni@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 598-4182
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents, including the Request for Quote (RFQ), can be downloaded from the Canada Buy Service website: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51898/30006357---rfq.pdf>. 

Please note that all required engagement and submission documents can be found within the attached Appendix.

For any inquiries or further information, please do not hesitate to contact the procurement representative listed above. The Government of Canada thanks all those who express interest in this project and wishes them good luck with the procurement process.

**Tender Closing Date:**
